channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA1][Network] - Network equipment replacement
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 1, 00:00 - 02:00 UTC

Sep 15, 00:24 UTC
Scheduled - Due to an imponderable we have to postpone the maintenance to a later date. A future update will indicate the date of intervention

Sep 15, 00:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Sep 14, 17:53 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 15/09/2022 00:00 UTC
End time : 15/09/2022 02:00 UTC
Service impact : Some network flapping during the switchover.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, a network equipment will be replaced.

item.title: [GRA2][Network] - Network equipment operation

Sep 14, 19:34 UTC
